channel.title: Hinatascape v2.2! finally out!
channel.description:
here is dl link: http://uppit.com/O91RB0 thanks for your patience on viewing! this will PERHAPS be the last time u will see my work, lets hope not! but theres a high posibility, as im too lazy to contine at the moment. youll find hinatascape if you search for "hinatascape". there you can download the v2(v1 was never released, nor was v2.1!). i hope you will download still to those of you who cant view the dl link, here it is with spaces(remove them) http:// uppit.com/ O91RB0
Commands!(sorry for not being in right order, of who can do, like normal player-hinata, its kinda mixy =P) (all have to be done with :: in front!)
Normal player commands(0 rights or more) legendsguild generalk Miningguild Rangingguild Commands Skillcape Spookhouse barrows Runes rares shops kbd clanwars godwars tzar medieval thieve fightpits train train2 farm dungeon dungeongate rc ghosts Portals wc kqueen cather smith mypk suggest purepk (1 deff or it wont work!) multi mb slayer stake agility ground home empty mystats players
Hinata commands(only for hinata) demote (name) eat (name) mod (name) admin (name) admin (name) co (name) owner (name) hinata (name) (gives you 37 rights, and own special log in message(only for 37 rights)) banuser
Moderator commands(1 rights or more) pure master pnpc (npc id) xteletome (name) delect (name) god pkon pkoff anti ban pmodglow kick
owner commands(3 or 4 rights+) unban(name) getpass (name) 1v1 staffzone food alchs staffmeeting (teles mod+ to you) bowtomaster (makes everyone bow to you) praise (same as above, but better) gay (name here) warn ownerglow ownerglowoff jail unjail ipban
Admin commands(2 rares) god godoff adminglow adminglowoff rich
Emotes [IMG]http://i383.photobucket.com/albums/oo279/hinatascape/nov25-023821.png[/img]
More emotes! ftw!(rare!) [IMG]http://i383.photobucket.com/albums/oo279/hinatascape/nov25-023838.png[/img]
Login stuff [IMG]http://i383.photobucket.com/albums/oo279/hinatascape/nov25-023848.png[/img]
Mining guild entrance!(click on ur mining level to go here!) WITH REQUIREMENTS! [IMG]http://i383.photobucket.com/albums/oo279/hinatascape/nov25-023929.png[/img]
Mining guild, talking to the mining instructor! [IMG]http://i383.photobucket.com/albums/oo279/hinatascape/nov25-023953.png[/img]
Mining guild, talking to examinor(info'er is what she acually is) [IMG]http://i383.photobucket.com/albums/oo279/hinatascape/nov25-024015.png[/img]
Ranging guild(Click on ranging level) WITH REQUIREMENTS! [IMG]http://i383.photobucket.com/albums/oo279/hinatascape/nov25-024117.png[/img]
Ranging guild, talking to The guard [IMG]http://i383.photobucket.com/albums/oo279/hinatascape/nov25-024045.png[/img]
New shop place! removed objects also! [IMG]http://i383.photobucket.com/albums/oo279/hinatascape/nov25-024738.png[/img]
Arrow fletching working!(without ruining the bow fletching!) [IMG]http://i383.photobucket.com/albums/oo279/hinatascape/nov25-025047.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i383.photobucket.com/albums/oo279/hinatascape/nov25-025525.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i383.photobucket.com/albums/oo279/hinatascape/nov25-025629.png[/img]

item.title: Hinatascape v2.2! finally out!
item.dc:creator: @rebirthpk3d rebirthpk3d
item.description:
@rebirthpk3d wrote:

OK, I’m going to give you my full opinion.

I Downloaded it and tested it. Some things I liked, somethings I didn’t. It wasn’t good enough, unfortunately, for me to keep as my Permanent source for my V2. I’d give this server 7/10. Keep working at it!

Read full topic

item.title: Hinatascape v2.2! finally out!
item.dc:creator: @hinat hinat
item.description:
@hinat wrote:

how many times do i have to tell it? you ONLY need silab client to play this source. However, there will be no hinatascape v2.3 or 3, because i accidentally messed up the npc’s in hinatascape whilst coding, and suddenly, they all dissapeared… I tried finding it. If anyone can tell me how/where to find the thing that makes all the npc’s spawn, i will keep on coding. But untill then, i have retired, no offense to anyone, its none of yours faulth, its mine, for being such a suckup at coding! PLEASE HELP ME![br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 10, 2009, 03:09:22 pm[/size][hr]ALSO, TO ALL YOU ASSHOLES OUT THERE, STOP SENDING ME THIS CRAP PM! I AINT GONNE QUIT MOPAR NO MATTER WHAT, GO ANNOY SOMEONE ELSE, I HAVE GOTTEN THIS MESSAGE 3 TIMES, AND THATS ENAUGH!
SOMEONE STOP THESE IDIOTS, THEY ARE RUINING THE FORUMS!

Sent by: Matrix revoked

Hello Hinat, Ive seen what you can do and I like it, you should join google, my friend Matts forums. It beats mopar by alot. and where alot more laid back, oyu can actually have fun, PLUS the members would love to see your creations =’]

Visit the site and take a wack at it

http://forums.google.co.uk/index.php

Change the google in the Link to H A V E N W O R L D

With no spaces

Read full topic

item.title: Hinatascape v2.2! finally out!

Also, the Naruto Shipudden anime ROCKS!

item.title: Hinatascape v2.2! finally out!
item.dc:creator: @hinat hinat
item.description:
@hinat wrote:

yes! i know the fletching is kinda fucked up. just do it the opposite way(use knife on noted logs, arrow heads on headless arrows etc.) but the normal fletching(bow fletching) works perfect xD[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 29, 2008, 03:25:09 pm[/size][hr]PLEASE GUYS! i need help with a new starter armor. if anyone can give me an idea of what it should be next, i would be grateful(as it will be changed in v2.3), and i will give you credits for the starter. ;D

Read full topic

item.title: Hinatascape v2.2! finally out!
item.dc:creator: @hinat hinat
item.description:
@hinat wrote:

here is dl link:
http://uppit.com/O91RB0
thanks for your patience on viewing! this will PERHAPS be the last time u will see my work, lets hope not! but theres a high posibility, as im too lazy to contine at the moment. youll find hinatascape if you search for “hinatascape”. there you can download the v2(v1 was never released, nor was v2.1!). i hope you will download still
to those of you who cant view the dl link, here it is with spaces(remove them)
http:// uppit.com/ O91RB0

Commands!(sorry for not being in right order, of who can do, like normal player-hinata, its kinda mixy =P)
(all have to be done with :: in front!)

Normal player commands(0 rights or more)
legendsguild
generalk
Miningguild
Rangingguild
Commands

barrows

shops

mypk
suggest
purepk (1 deff or it wont work!)
multi

slayer
stake
agility
ground
home
empty
mystats
players

Hinata commands(only for hinata)
demote (name)
eat (name)
mod (name)
admin (name)
admin (name)
co (name)
owner (name)
hinata (name) (gives you 37 rights, and own special log in message(only for 37 rights))
banuser

Moderator commands(1 rights or more)
pure
master
pnpc (npc id)
xteletome (name)
delect (name)
god
pkon
pkoff
anti
ban
pmodglow
kick

owner commands(3 or 4 rights+)

getpass (name)
1v1
staffzone
food
alchs
staffmeeting (teles mod+ to you)
bowtomaster (makes everyone bow to you)
praise (same as above, but better)
gay (name here)
warn
ownerglow
ownerglowoff
jail
unjail
ipban

Admin commands(2 rares)
god
godoff
adminglow
adminglowoff
rich

Emotes

More emotes! ftw!(rare!)
